attributes.title: This app harassed me
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and after a second of being in the app it told me that it could sense I was Mexican and it would deport me and my family obviously I thought this was a little weird and the app continued to keep sending me threats. I was very scared and traumatized Mind you I have been in this app for barely a second. I am now going to therapy 50 times a week because of this incident and I‚Äôm just so disappointed in this app.

attributes.title: seemingly innocent app eats children in one bite
attributes.review: truly terrible app :( i opened the app just trying to show my loving devotion to our President Cheeto Puff, when the Cheeto in Chief himself jumped out of the screen and ate my first born son. 10/10 for a good scare but 1/10 because it left a big mess all over my floor to clean up. only download this app if you‚Äôre looking for a failsafe way to delete your children from the planet. make sure to put down plastic before opening app.

attributes.title: Caution-
attributes.review: This app is very dangerous. I downloaded it an I got a very concerning alert to my cellular saying I have received a virus. The virus has now taken over all of the phones in my household environment an it is very concerning and alerting. This app should be taken down immediately before anyone else suffers from this costly virus. An addition to that issue there were nudes on this app an I was VERY displeased to see those tiny balls an I will never recommend this app to my worst enemy. -Obama 2020

attributes.title: CURSED APP
attributes.review: I opened this app and my dog passed out. I didn‚Äôt think much of it but then as I put in my number my mom yelled for help. She got stuck in the refrigerator. This app is most likely cursed. I asked my brother to get the app and nothing happened until he went blind in one eye!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO HAVE THE POSSIBILITY OF DYING!! Plus this dude almost blinded meüü†. My mom did get out of the refrigerator but unfortunately my brother cannot see our of his right eye. Just basically don‚Äôt get the app!

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: The SECOND i opened to app my eyes were blinded by a tangerine looking man standing in front of the flag (which i think is against those flag rules). That was when my phone started to shake uncomfortably and then the pool noodle in the corner of my room began to fly around like a ballon losing air. Not only was this app unhelpful, it has horrible reviews and was set up poorly. I think yall should just remove it. For the safety of pool noodles and our country of course. :)

attributes.title: WOW
attributes.review: i‚Äôm offended by how much information it is asking me to fill out. are you trying to get all of information to keep tabs on me or something? why would they need my location and my notification permissions??? so they can spy on me. not happening. every picture of the TRUMP was WAY too DETAILED. i could see every pore on his face and it genuinely made me gag to where my daughter was worrying about me. i told her it was just donald and she began to gag with me. truly awful.

attributes.title: This app is MALWARE trying to SELL YOUR INFO TO THE CHINESE!!!!!!! DONT INSTALL!!!!!!!
